title: EastEnders spoilers: Mel exposes Sharon's and Keanu's secret publicly?
text:
Mel Owen (Tamzin Outwaite) has been blackmailing Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean) for quite some time in EastEnders, — and their feud has reached boiling point on a number of occasions, —but Mel ups the ante once more in the coming episodes — but is she planning on revealing the big secret in front of everyone?

While Mel has proven to be a thorn in Sharon’s side, she’s also been getting on Keanu’s (Danny Walters) nerves as well and, in the coming episodes, she hints that she knows his big secret, and he’s forced him to hide his panic in front of both Louise (Tilly Keeper) and Lisa (Lucy Benjamin).

Elsewhere — knowing full well that Mel is the one forcing Sharon to sell the club — Ben (Max Bowden) attempts to persuade Mel to stop bullying his stepmum. However, Mel soon mentions a Mitchell family secret — and Ben’s interests are piqued as a result. Later, he asks Sharon what Mel was referring to, but she quickly plays down the importance of what was has said.

Advertisement

Advertisement

As Louise’s birthday arrives, Mel continues to provoke Keanu with knowledge of his secret — and everyone is left shocked when she reveals what she bought Louise.

At The Queen Vic, Sharon — fed with the manipulation and games — decides to confront Mel, but she grows worried once she learns just how desperate for revenge Mel truly is.

Later, Mel toasts Ruby (Louisa Lytton) for her having purchased the club. As the pair chat, Mel reveals that she’s planning a huge joint party for Sharon and Louise — and that she’s hoping the whole Square will attend.

Mel’s ruthlessness is coming to light, as she becomes hellbent on getting revenge.

With her already toying with Keanu about his secret, and deliberately piquing Ben’s interest, it’s becoming more and more apparent just how far she’s willing to go. With a public celebration on the horizon, will she finally reveal all about Sharon and Keanu’s affair?

The fact that she wants the whole Square there would certainly seem to suggest so!

One to watch: Friday 8th November at 8pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Mel's determined to get revenge — at any cost.
